t=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(0,t):
    np=int(raw_input())
    P=map(int,raw_input().split())
    R=map(int,raw_input().split())
    
    count=0
    while np!=0:
        mr=max(R)
        mp=max(P)
        if mr>mp or mr==mp:
                count+=1
                np-=1
                R.remove(mr)
                P.remove(mp)
        else:
            P.remove(mp)
            np-=1
    print count
